column4: I screwed up my Taskbar and junk and i want the Basic starting Layout back is that possible?
I screwed up my Taskbar and junk and i want the Basic starting Layout back is that possible?    without creating a new user
you could try renanming the .gnome directory and seeing if it generates a new one next time you login
on my system there's a gconf, a gconfd, a gnome and a gnome2 directory. i'd find the right one by trial and error :)
